name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D LIVE!!!】3D新衣装お披露目!! ゲストと歌って踊って生誕祭♪♪♪【hololive⧸宝鐘マリン】 [wF_VmniNI2I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Houshou Marine presents her new 3D outfit to her guests: Usada Pekora, Shirogane Noel, and Shiranui Flare.
Performance of the song 'Ahoy!! 我ら宝鐘海賊団☆' (Ahoy!! We are the Houshou Pirates☆).

subtitles.original: ちょっと年を取ってみました。
subtitles.english: I tried aging a bit.

subtitles.original: 勇気を出して、勇気の決断、年を取るという決断をしました。
subtitles.english: I took a leap of faith, a courageous decision to age.

subtitles.original: めっちゃエロくね？
subtitles.english: Isn't it super erotic?

subtitles.original: 大丈夫なのこれ？
subtitles.english: Is this even allowed?

subtitles.original: おっぱいがすごい！
subtitles.english: Her boobs are amazing!

subtitles.original: じゃんじゃーん！
subtitles.english: Ta-da!

subtitles.original: はい、こちらの衣装ね、100万人記念でいただきました。
subtitles.english: Yes, I received this outfit for reaching 1 million subs.

subtitles.original: おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Congratulations!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！じゃんじゃかじゃーん！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much! Ta-da-da-da!

subtitles.original: え、おっぱいがすごい... 大丈夫？
subtitles.english: Wait, those boobs are incredible... Are you okay?

subtitles.original: めっちゃ揺れてる！やばいよこれ！
subtitles.english: They're swaying so much! This is crazy!

subtitles.original: え、なんのこと？
subtitles.english: Eh, what are you talking about?

subtitles.original: めっちゃ動く！すごい！
subtitles.english: They move so much! Incredible!

subtitles.original: すっごい揺れてるぺこ！
subtitles.english: They're swaying like crazy, peko!

subtitles.original: いや、目の前に来たから出しちゃおっかなって。
subtitles.english: Well, they're right there, so I thought I'd show them.

subtitles.original: 手とかあるし、手。あ、船長...
subtitles.english: There's hands and stuff, hands. Oh, the Captain's...

subtitles.original: あ、毎回あかさあい先生、船長のお母さんですね。
subtitles.english: Ah, every time Akasa Ai-sensei—my 'mother.'

subtitles.original: 毎回「エッチな感じでお願いします」って丸投げしてるんですけど...
subtitles.english: I always just tell her 'make it erotic' and leave it to her...

subtitles.original: そしたら、こうなりました。
subtitles.english: ...and this is what happened.

subtitles.original: めっちゃええやん。
subtitles.english: It's really nice.

subtitles.original: いいねいいね。
subtitles.english: I like it, I like it.

subtitles.original: え、髪の毛も可愛いね。
subtitles.english: Oh, your hair is cute too.

subtitles.original: そうなの、髪の毛も。ほら、ほら。
subtitles.english: That's right, the hair too. Look, look.

subtitles.original: こんな、メッシュ入ってるし。
subtitles.english: It's got these highlights and everything.

subtitles.original: え、もうみんなもしかしてさ、これ脱いでほしい？
subtitles.english: Wait, maybe you all want me to take this off?

subtitles.original: え、大丈夫？
subtitles.english: Eh, is that okay?

subtitles.original: なんかそろそろ帰るか。
subtitles.english: Well, it's about time to head home.

subtitles.original: 帰ろうか、時間だもんね。
subtitles.english: Let's go back, it's almost time.

subtitles.original: バイバイ！お疲れ様ー！
subtitles.english: Bye-bye! Good work everyone!

subtitles.original: 脱いだところ見たい？みんな、脱いだところ見たい？
subtitles.english: You want to see me take it off? Do you all want to see?

subtitles.original: 誰も... あれ？
subtitles.english: No one...? Huh?

subtitles.original: 海賊ならヨーホー
subtitles.english: If you're a pirate, Yo-ho

subtitles.original: お宝掲げヨーホー
subtitles.english: Raise the treasure, Yo-ho

subtitles.original: さあ、今、旗の下、集え
subtitles.english: Now, gather under the flag

subtitles.original: 方舟描いてくだ...
subtitles.english: Draw an ark...

subtitles.original: 出航！
subtitles.english: Set sail!

subtitles.original: Ahoy! Ahoy! Ahoy! Ahoy!
subtitles.english: Ahoy! Ahoy! Ahoy! Ahoy!

subtitles.original: 踊るアホイ 見るアホイ
subtitles.english: Dancing Ahoy, Watching Ahoy

subtitles.original: 全速前進だー！
subtitles.english: Full speed ahead!

subtitles.original:
Ahoy!! 我ら宝鐘海賊団☆
作詞：まろん(IOSYS) 作曲：ARM(IOSYS)
subtitles.english:
Ahoy!! We are the Houshou Pirates☆
Lyrics: maron (IOSYS) Composition: ARM (IOSYS)

subtitles.original: 爪 詰め 大洋は燦々 絶好海日和だ
subtitles.english: Pack your gear, the ocean is bright, it's a perfect day for sailing

subtitles.original: 歌え 唄え 最高の本性 波の音に乗せ
subtitles.english: Sing, sing your true self, riding the sound of the waves

subtitles.original: どんぶらこ 海で さあ 行く先 おかげアニキがハッピー
subtitles.english: Floating on the sea, let's go, thanks to you all everyone is happy

subtitles.original: 踊らな損々 ギラギラ
subtitles.english: If you don't dance it's your loss, glittering

subtitles.original: 野望 ボロボロ マイハウスで 夢を見て
subtitles.english: Ambition in tatters, dreaming in my house

subtitles.original: あぁ... 神様 いつかこのマリンを本物の海賊にしてください
subtitles.english: Ah... God, please make this Marine a real pirate someday

subtitles.original: 声を上げて さあ 出航だ 我ら宝鐘海賊団☆
subtitles.english: Raise your voice, now set sail, we are the Houshou Pirates☆

subtitles.original: コンパス片手に 旗を上げ この海をジャックしちゃおう
subtitles.english: Compass in hand, raise the flag, let's take over this sea

subtitles.original: よそ見して おいで 共にヨーホーヨーホー叫ぼう
subtitles.english: Don't look away, come, let's shout Yo-ho, Yo-ho together

subtitles.original: あぁ... 最高の 日々 ようこそ 我が船
subtitles.english: Ah... the best days, welcome to my ship

subtitles.original: Ahoy! Ahoy! Ahoy! Ahoy!
subtitles.english: Ahoy! Ahoy! Ahoy! Ahoy!

subtitles.original: 踊るアホイ 見るアホイ
subtitles.english: Dancing Ahoy, Watching Ahoy
1, 2, 3, Mackerel! Mackerel!

subtitles.original: 熱く語ろうよ パッション 思いを解き放て
subtitles.english: Let's talk passionately, release your feelings

subtitles.original: 熱く きらめく ファッション 形から入るタイプです
subtitles.english: Hot, glittering fashion, I'm the type who starts with appearances

subtitles.original: 発射 10秒前 走れ ガソリン入れちゃ
subtitles.english: 10 seconds to launch, run, fill up the tank

subtitles.original: 日焼けも照れるわ ギラギラ
subtitles.english: Sunburn is embarrassing too, glittering

subtitles.original: じわり汗も 滴るイイ女 だけど
subtitles.english: I'm a fine woman even with sweat dripping, but

subtitles.original: あぁ... 神様 船長がセンシティブだと BANされちゃうのですね はにゃ〜
subtitles.english: Ah... God, if the captain is too sensitive, she'll get banned, won't she? Hannya~

subtitles.original: 歌えばほら 取り戻せ それが宝鐘海賊団☆
subtitles.english: Look, if you sing, you'll get it back, that's the Houshou Pirates☆

subtitles.original: 君たちとなら たどり着ける 伝説のエルドラド
subtitles.english: With you all, we can reach the legendary El Dorado

subtitles.original: よそ見 楽しけりゃ 歌えヨーホーヨーホー足りない
subtitles.english: If you're having fun looking elsewhere, sing Yo-ho, Yo-ho, it's not enough

subtitles.original: あぁ... この景色 大切な仲間よ
subtitles.english: Ah... this scenery, my precious comrades

subtitles.original: 宴だ 宴だ 騒げや 騒げ
subtitles.english: It's a party, it's a party, let's make some noise

subtitles.original: 踊るアホイ 見るアホイ
subtitles.english: Dancing Ahoy, Watching Ahoy

subtitles.original: 同じアホなら 飲まなきゃ損々
subtitles.english: If you're the same fool, it's a loss if you don't drink

subtitles.original: ジョッキ片手に 行きますよ
subtitles.english: With a mug in hand, here I go

subtitles.original: アホイ！アホイ！アホイ！アホイ！
subtitles.english: Ahoy! Ahoy! Ahoy! Ahoy!

subtitles.original: 宝鐘マリン 宝鐘マリン 世界で一番可愛いよ
subtitles.english: Houshou Marine, Houshou Marine, you're the cutest in the world

subtitles.original: メスガキ メスガキ エロガキ エロガキ
